alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Henry; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 7:12PM CDT until May 07 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR PUTNAM...SOUTHEASTERN HENRY AND SOUTHERN BUREAU COUNTIES... At 712 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Annawan, or 8 miles north of Kewanee, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Kewanee, Mineral and Johnson-Sauk Trail State Park around 720 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Sheffield, Neponset, Buda, Providence, Tiskilwa, Milo, Putnam, Lone Tree Corners and Lake Thunderbird. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
